plot outline: Satish is an everyman who leads a rather uneventful life. However, things are about to change, with a series of eerie and inexplicable events beginning to unfold in his secluded little apartment. Could there be a supernatural element behind all of this? Or is he slowly losing his mind?
title: Illa
plot: Satish is an everyman who leads a rather uneventful life. However, things are about to change, with a series of eerie and inexplicable events beginning to unfold in his secluded little apartment. Could there be a supernatural element behind all of this? Or is he slowly losing his mind?
